name: Pawed Piper
description:
Lumi the little Ragdoll cat is looking for her food bowl. Can you help her reach it?

Controls
WASD - Walk (one step at a time)
SPACE - Switch leading cat

This game was developed as an entry for Mini Jam 80. All assets were made during this game jam.

Background music via https://www.FesliyanStudios.com
